pageContent: Background: The National Research Council (CNR) prostate cancer monitoring project in Italy (Pros-IT CNR) is an observational, prospective, ongoing, multicentre study aiming to monitor a sample of Italian males diagnosed as new cases of prostate cancer. The present study aims to present data on the quality of life at time prostate cancer is diagnosed.

metaData.source:
Studies on the origin of the voltammetric response of the PC-3 cell suspension
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/19203631/
